verses.roman:
śuśrūṣayā paramayā
pāda-saṁvāhanādibhiḥ
pūjito deva-devena
vipra-devena deva-vat

synonyms: śuśrūṣayā—with service; paramayā—sincere; pāda—of the feet; saṁvāhana—massaging; ādibhiḥ—and so on; pūjitaḥ—worshiped; deva-devena—by the Lord of all the demigods; vipra-devena—by the Lord of the brāhmaṇas; deva—a demigod; vat—like.
translation: Although He is the Lord of all demigods and the object of worship for all brāhmaṇas, He worshiped me as if I were a demigod myself, massaging my feet and rendering other humble services.
